meaningMnemonic: A <radical>gate</radical> with a <radical>lantern</radical> is <kanji>open</kanji> for you. That's convenient, since it's pretty dark out and you might not have seen the open gate without the lantern's help.
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>open</kanji> gate is in the water though, so you'll need a <reading>kay</reading>ak (かい) to get in. Luckily, you've been carrying your kayak with you just in case.
